title: Online Self-Directed Learning Project for Maintaining Functional Abilities in Parkinson’s Disease Patients

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of basic physiology and neuroscience
context.additional_context: Learners analyze online self-directed content for maintaining functional abilities in Parkinson’s patients, propose effective instructional design solutions, and gain experience evaluating/developing digital learning materials

learning_goals: Analyze core elements of online self-directed learning videos that help Parkinson’s patients understand and manage functional issues (e.g., gait, balance, daily activities)
Apply a systematic framework to evaluate the quality of educational videos for Parkinson’s patients based on instructional design principles
Design and propose a project-based approach to develop patient-centered effective online learning content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
